snippet.title: Hamster Playground - Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Brace yourselves!
From 11.07.2024 Hamster Playground will be available for PC [Steam], Playstation 4 & 5, Xbox One & Series S|X, and Nintendo Switch. 
The game is a Free-To-Play mix of Tamagotchi, Sims, and cute minigames. 

Music and Lyrics: Andrzej Strzemżalski

Store Links: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1442670/Hamster_Playground/
https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/hamster-playground-switch/
https://store.playstation.com/pl-pl/concept/10004572
https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/hamster-playground/9nhqc2j6r4w7
